Kartlar

        
            // Break Point

// Ayarlar
$prefix: px;

// Hazır ayarlar
$points: (
    "pc": 1200,
    "laptop": 992,
    "tablet": 769,
    "telefon": 600
);

@mixin media($veri, $tip: max) {
    $veri-tipi: type-of($veri);
    $break-point: null;
    
    @if $veri-tipi == number{
        @media screen and (#{$tip}-width: #{$veri}) {
            @content;
        }
    }@else if $veri-tipi == string{
        
        @each $deger, $index in $points{
            @if $veri == $deger{
                $break-point: $index;
            }
        }
        
        @if $break-point != null {
            @media screen and (#{$tip}-width: #{$break-point}#{$prefix}) {
                @content;
            }
        } @else {
            @warn "Hatalı breakpoint değeri";
            /* 
                !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
                Hatalı breakpoint değeri 
                !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
            */
        }
    }
}
// Break Point SON


// Tema
@mixin tema($tema: "default") {
    $element: #{&};
    @at-root html[data-theme=#{$tema}] #{$element} {
        @content;
    }
}
// Tema SON


// Font Size
@mixin fs($size, $rem: 1) {
    font-size: $size * 1px;
    font-size: em-hesapla($size, $rem);
}
// Font Size SON


// Font Face
@mixin font-face($name, $file) {
    @font-face {
        font-family: "#{$name}";
        src: url("../fonts/#{$file}.eot");
        src: url("../fonts/#{$file}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"),
        url("../fonts/#{$file}.woff") format("woff"),
        url("../fonts/#{$file}.ttf") format("truetype"),
        url("../fonts/#{$file}.svg?#webfont") format("svg");
    }
}
// Font Face SON


// Genel
@mixin ortala {
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
}

@mixin cover-background {
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}

@mixin text-truncate() {
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    white-space: nowrap;
}
// Genel SON


// Flex
@mixin flex {
    display: flex;
}

@mixin flex-center {
    align-items: center;
    align-content: center;
    justify-content: center
}

@mixin flex-row {
    @include flex;
    flex-direction: row;
}

@mixin flex-column {
    @include flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}

@mixin flex-center-row {
    @include flex-row;
    @include flex-center;
}

@mixin flex-center-column {
    @include flex-column;
    @include flex-center;
}
// Flex SON
